1111590.name: Linked Mask
1111590.description:
You will reincarnate as Viewer, who has been called by the gods to confront The People's Champ and so emerge as a new god.

Will you be able to perform the divine command?






Far away from the city and all the light it emits, the people of the past built 6 towers.

The towers are home to every deity that was abandoned by these people. Every fate, every voice, every dream is linked to the towers, to their deities - and to the masks.

Now every deity awaits to be annihilated so that they can finally have eternal rest.

Get all masks Viewer, only then will you be able to face The People's Champ and claim your place.

The gods are waiting for you to enjoy Linked Mask, a captivating return to the golden days of I Wanna Be The Guy, IWKTG, and a love letter to the Kaizo RomHacks featuring a brutal Game Boy style visual and soundtrack crafted to blow your mind.




  • THE CORE MECHANIC THOUGHT FOR FAST PLAY - Slide to gain speed, every jump will feel like a heart attack with platforms designed for a perfect landing.

  • MODERN CLASSIC - Linked Mask's art style is designed as a throwback to early 90's handheld games, mixed with a uniquely modern presentation despite its palette limit.

  • CHALLENGE THE 6 TOWERS - Each tower consists of several levels of increasing difficulty, and climaxes in a battle against a Deity. Collect the 6 Deity masks and face the ultimate challenge: the People's Castle!

  • GOD LEVEL BATTLES - Each boss will be waiting for you in their terrestrial form to hide their true intentions with their overpowering personalities, the battles are designed to keep you on the very edge to bring out your maximum reaction potential.

  • EVERY VICTORY MAKES YOU STRONGER - Collect 6 masks, each of which grants a special movement ability. You can return to the towers with new abilities and discover new routes to optimize your time and even make your way easier.

  • PRACTICE ZONES AS MANY TIMES AS YOU WANT - The towers have a save system per completed zone, so you can revisit as many times as you want to practice the zone you want to master and even change towers without having killed a god.

  • YOU CAN GET OPTIONAL WEAPONS - Each tower has its own Kaizo Zone that will contain 5 coins that will open the door to the gift of the gods giving you an upgrade to your orb as a reward.

  • MIND-BLOWING MUSIC - A chilling soundtrack will make your head ring as you traverse the deadly Towers - and every fight with a Deity will be accompanied by epic music.

  • A FINAL LEVEL AT YOUR LEVEL - The People's Castle will test all your skills to deliver an experience that will bring more than a few tears to your eyes.



We are waiting for you, Viewer.
